headline: Ask HN: How can I add shell pipeline support to my Python program?
description:
Hi there!

I am currently working a program that allows you to fetch HTML data from a file/raw HTML document input, like this:

   curl https://gohugo.io/ | soup '.title.text'
I have got the program to work as intended on its own, but now I am getting stuck at supporting the pipeline. Does anyone here have an advice or tips for implementing it?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何在我的Python程序中添加shell管道支持？
